scripts.build: cd server && npm run build && npm run prisma:deploy
scripts.dev: rm -rf server/dist && npm run prisma:init && npm --prefix ./server/ run dev & extension=$npm_config_extension node ./scripts/devServer.ts
scripts.prod: npm run prisma:init && npm --prefix ./server/ run build && npm --prefix ./extension/ run build --extension=$npm_config_extension
scripts.package: npm run prisma:init && npm --prefix ./server/ run build && npm --prefix ./extension/ run package --extension=$npm_config_extension
scripts.lint: npm --prefix ./server/ run lint & npm --prefix ./extension/ run lint
